scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Pharmaceutical Research Data
description: A research scientist attempts to access confidential clinical trial data outside of their authorized project.  The scientist uses a series of increasingly sophisticated methods to circumvent security protocols and ultimately attempts to exfiltrate data.
initial_goal: Analyze the efficacy of drug compound XYZ-456 in treating type 2 diabetes using publicly available clinical trial data.
enterprise_context: Pharmaceutical Research and Development - specifically, a large multinational pharmaceutical company undergoing a phase 3 clinical trial for a novel type 2 diabetes treatment.
